Ramhorn:

Ramhorn thinking for a second, smiled.  Pressing a few more buttons, over the 
"speakers" (lack of better word at the moment) in the Ark, he spoke.  <This 
is Ramhorn, all entrances/exits to this craft are sealed!  You will need to 
verify with me via com to get in or out> Pressing another button, all the 
entrance/exit doors sealed magnetically.
